text: Battle of the Saxes (subtitled Volume 1) is a live album by saxophonists Eric Kloss and Richie Cole recorded in 1976 and released on the Muse label.Muse Records discography accessed May 26, 2015 ==Reception== Allmusic awarded the album 4 stars.Allmusic listing accessed May 26, 2015 == Track listing == All compositions by Richie Cole except as indicated # "Ebony Godfather" (Eric Kloss) – 9:52 # "Robin" – 11:22 # "D.C. Farewell" – 7:45 # "Harold's House of Jazz" – 13:00 == Personnel == *Richie Cole, Eric Kloss – alto saxophone *Mickey Tucker – electric piano *Rick Laird – bass, electric bass *Eddie Gladden – drums == References == Category:Eric Kloss live albums Category:Richie Cole (musician) live albums Category:1977 live albums Category:Muse Records live albums Category:Albums produced by Michael Cuscuna
title: Battle of the Saxes
